text.div: • Include codes from http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-RoleClass where concept is-a INGR

name: RoleClassIngredientEntity
title: RoleClassIngredientEntity
description: Relates a component (player) to a mixture (scoper). E.g., Glucose and Water are ingredients of D5W, latex may be an ingredient in a tracheal tube.
